advancements.intrications.root.title: ijo ike
advancements.intrications.root.desc: ijo pi kepeken lili. tenpo ni la ona li pona
advancements.intrications.useless_projec: o moli e ijo kepeken ko monsuta tan palisa pi ko monsuta
advancements.intrications.artificial_inf: o suli e monsuta ko kepeken palisa pi ko monsuta
o moli e ijo kepeken ijo pana wawa
advancements.intrications.tchaikovsky_no: jan Sawikosi o, o ni ala!
"ilo pi pakala anpa li pali ala e kalama musi!" "ona ken. mi kepeken e ona mute wan!"
